channel.title: Notes on Šimon Váry
channel.description: Recent content in Notes on Šimon Váry

item.title: Planted clique problem
item.description: The following is very difficult to solve $$ \max_{x} \lVert A x \rVert_2, \quad \mathrm{s.t.} \quad \lVert x\rVert_0 \leq s, \lVert x\rVert_2 = 1, $$ when $s = \mathcal{O}(\log(n))$ and reasonably difficult when $s = \mathcal{O}(\sqrt{n})$ Definition

item.title: Some linear algebra theorems
item.description: Some useful linear algebra theorems. Davis-Kahan $\sin(\theta)$ theorem Von Neumann’s trace inequality (and its extensions) Computing principal angles What can one get out of the incoherence?
